name: Push Ups
description: A basic upper-body exercise that strengthens chest, shoulders, and triceps.
instructions:
1. Start in a plank position.
2. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.
3. Push back up.
4. Repeat for 10-15 reps.

name: Squats
description: A fundamental lower-body exercise to build strength in legs and glutes.
instructions:
1. Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
2. Lower your hips as if sitting in a chair.
3. Keep chest up and knees over toes.
4. Return to standing.
5. Repeat for 12-15 reps.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
description: Isolate and strengthen the biceps using dumbbells.
instructions:
1. Stand with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
2. Curl the dumbbells up to shoulder height.
3. Lower slowly back to start.
4. Repeat for 10-12 reps.
